original_title: Beyond the Visible: The Story of the Very Large Array
overview: Narrated by Academy Award-winning actress Jodie Foster (star of the film "Contact," which was based on the novel by Carl Sagan and filmed at the VLA), the program depicts many of the people whose diverse efforts enable the VLA to be a cutting-edge resource for astronomers and humanity worldwide.
title: Beyond the Visible: The Story of the Very Large Array
